content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 5, KRC Genk 0.

Foul by Raul Meireles (Chelsea).

Attempt blocked. Raul Meireles (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Branislav Ivanovic.
Attempt missed. Florent Malouda (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Paulo Ferreira with a cross.
Attempt saved. Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Florent Malouda with a cross.
